name: 20DOT20
description:
20DOT20

Hey! Thanks for checking out my game! This is my first ever actually finished game and this is my first ever game jam.

The game is made in Godot.

Everything in the game, apart from the font and some sfx, is made by me during the game jam.  Props to my girlfriend for letting me record her voice! Oh and the levels are randomly generated so it's different every time you play.
